metadata.name: Recon Information for Export with Command Prompt
metadata.comment: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\tree.com')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\doskey.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sc.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('wmic\\.exe', 'doskey\\.exe', 'sc\\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' > %temp%\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' > %tmp%\\\\'))))

output.summary: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.
